annonsrubrik: QA Manager based in Oslo, Stockholm or Gdansk
annonstext:
What we offer you
Talentech is the leading company in the Nordics for building smart recruitment tools. What all Talentechers have in common is a passion for simplifying our users' lives and helping them succeed in their jobs - to find the right talent for their own companies and recruit them effectively, professionally, and fairly. In that, the development process is central to our future growth and expansion outside the Nordic region.

About the role 
In 2020 we had 8.8 million job applications through our services and more than 200.000 active HR professionals and managers working in our software. Continuous delivery of valuable products with high quality is at the heart of what we do in Talentech. As a QA Manager you will be responsible for the test strategy for a portfolio of SaaS products, test automation and tools. You will work hands on with teams to automate test cases, coach other QA Engineers and continuously improve the quality of our products.

You need to be enthusiastic in what you do and provide structure and tools to the teams to achieve great quality. We are an international team with development hubs in Oslo, Stockholm and Gdansk and this position can be placed in any of these locations. The position is a permanent employment with start date determined by agreement.

Qualifications: 
To enjoy and succeed in this role we believe you have been working with quality assurance and software testing of web applications for at least 5 years. You want to take the next step in your career and take a lead on Talentechs new test strategy with focus on test automation. Maybe you have some experience with setting test strategies, or this is something you want to grow into. Good communication skills in English are required, and you have experience from working with

• Test strategy and test automation
• ISTQB certification or equivalent
• Continuous integration and deployments
• SaaS systems

Do you want to grow with us and find this as an interesting opportunity?

Apply how you prefer, it does not matter if it's with a LinkedIn profile, a film, CV and/or personal letter as long as you show your interest. We work continuously with the selection and will schedule interviews on an ongoing basis, so if you think the position is interesting- submit your application today. 

We look forward to receiving your application! 

About us
In 2019, HR Manager, Reachmee, Webcruiter and Talmundo merged to form Talentech, which is today the Nordic region's leading SaaS company for Talent Acquisition. With offices / partners throughout the Nordic region and the Netherlands, we serve more than 2,200 satisfied customers - from small recruitment companies to large companies in both the public and private sectors. The company's solutions are used daily for recruitment, onboarding and HR operations in more than 100 countries around the world. The company has a strong owner through Verdane, which is a Norwegian private equity company.   

Our employees are characterized by a willingness and ability to provide out-of-the-ordinary service to our customers and partners. Read more about us at: www.talentech.com

What we offer you
Talentech is the leading company in the Nordics for building smart recruitment tools. What all Talentechers have in common is a passion for simplifying our users' lives and helping them succeed in their jobs - to find the right talent for their own companies and recruit them effectively, professionally, and fairly. In that, the development process is central to our future growth and expansion outside the Nordic region.

About the role 
In 2020 we had 8.8 million job applications through our services and more than 200.000 active HR professionals and managers working in our software. Continuous delivery of valuable products with high quality is at the heart of what we do in Talentech. As a QA Manager you will be responsible for the test strategy for a portfolio of SaaS products, test automation and tools. You will work hands on with teams to automate test cases, coach other QA Engineers and continuously improve the quality of our products.

You need to be enthusiastic in what you do and provide structure and tools to the teams to achieve great quality. We are an international team with development hubs in Oslo, Stockholm and Gdansk and this position can be placed in any of these locations. The position is a permanent employment with start date determined by agreement.

Qualifications: 
To enjoy and succeed in this role we believe you have been working with quality assurance and software testing of web applications for at least 5 years. You want to take the next step in your career and take a lead on Talentechs new test strategy with focus on test automation. Maybe you have some experience with setting test strategies, or this is something you want to grow into. Good communication skills in English are required, and you have experience from working with


• Test strategy and test automation
• ISTQB certification or equivalent
• Continuous integration and deployments
• SaaS systems

Do you want to grow with us and find this as an interesting opportunity?

Apply how you prefer, it does not matter if it's with a LinkedIn profile, a film, CV and/or personal letter as long as you show your interest. We work continuously with the selection and will schedule interviews on an ongoing basis, so if you think the position is interesting- submit your application today. 

We look forward to receiving your application! 

About us
In 2019, HR Manager, Reachmee, Webcruiter and Talmundo merged to form Talentech, which is today the Nordic region's leading SaaS company for Talent Acquisition. With offices / partners throughout the Nordic region and the Netherlands, we serve more than 2,200 satisfied customers - from small recruitment companies to large companies in both the public and private sectors. The company's solutions are used daily for recruitment, onboarding and HR operations in more than 100 countries around the world. The company has a strong owner through Verdane, which is a Norwegian private equity company.   

Our employees are characterized by a willingness and ability to provide out-of-the-ordinary service to our customers and partners. Read more about us at: www.talentech.com
